alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued October 22 at 4:27AM MST until October 23 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 60 mph expected. The strongest winds are expected from 8 PM MST tonight through 8 AM MST Sunday morning. * WHERE...Eastern Mogollon Rim and adjacent Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...From noon today to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose debris, damage property and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People are urged to secure loose objects that could be blown around or damaged by the wind.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; White Mountains
